name: Tweak Synth Analog
description: Analog synth programmed in UVI Falcon

parameters.name: Filter Cutoff
parameters.description: This is the cutoff for the low pass filter

parameters.name: Resonance
parameters.description: This is the resonance for the low pass filter

parameters.name: Amp Env Attack
parameters.description: Attack time for the amplifier envelope

parameters.name: Amp Env Decay
parameters.description: Decay time for the amplifier envelope

parameters.name: Amp Env Sustain
parameters.description: Sustain level for the amplifier envelope

parameters.name: Amp Env Release
parameters.description: Release time for the amplifier envelope

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Amount
parameters.description: Controls the degree to which the low pass filter cutoff frequency is modulated by the filter envelope

parameters.name: Filter Env Attack
parameters.description: Attack time for the filter envelope

parameters.name: Filter Env Decay
parameters.description: Decay time for the filter envelope

parameters.name: Filter Env Sustain
parameters.description: Sustain level for the filter envelope

parameters.name: Filter Env Release
parameters.description: Release time for the filter envelope

parameters.name: Wave Osc 1
parameters.description: The waveform for oscillator 1

parameters.name: Wave Osc 2
parameters.description: The waveform for oscillator 2

parameters.name: Osc 1 Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for oscillator 1

parameters.name: Osc 2 Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for oscillator 2

parameters.name: Noise Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for the noise oscillator

parameters.name: Filter Modulation
parameters.description: The modulation amount for the low pass filter

parameters.name: Hardsync 1 Modulation
parameters.description: The modulation amount for hardsync on oscillator 1

parameters.name: Hardsync 2 Modulation
parameters.description: The modulation amount for hardsync on oscillator 2

parameters.name: Pitch 1 Modulation
parameters.description: The modulation amount for pitch on oscillator 1

parameters.name: Pitch 2 Modulation
parameters.description: The modulation amount for pitch on oscillator 2

parameters.name: Reverb
parameters.description: Amount of reverb on the sound

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.description: Amount of delay on the sound

parameters.name: Arpeggiator
parameters.description: Turn the arpeggiator on or off
